data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Quba-Khachmaz, Azerbaijan.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Quba-Khachmaz, Azerbaijan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 38,300 lost in Quba-Khachmaz that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Quba-Khachmaz, Azerbaijan to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Quba-Khachmaz.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Azerbaijani people. Make the Azerbaijani people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Quba-Khachmaz. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Quba-Khachmaz, Azerbaijan that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Quba-Khachmaz, Azerbaijan has a population of 38,400.

We estimate Quba-Khachmaz has 100 people who might know Jesus, 1,112 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 37,188 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 383 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 37,188 who are far from you in Quba-Khachmaz, Azerbaijan from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
